words.definition: The first meal of the day.
A meal eaten in the middle of the day.
The main meal eaten in the evening.
words.arabic_definition: الوجبة الرئيسية التي تؤكل في المساء.

example.en: I cook dinner for the family.

words.definition: A small amount of food eaten between meals.
words.arabic_definition: كمية صغيرة من الطعام تؤكل بين الوجبات.

example.en: I had a snack after school.

words.definition: A list of available dishes in a restaurant.

example.en: We looked at the menu before ordering.
example.ar: نظرنا إلى قائمة الطعام قبل الطلب.

words.definition: A small dish eaten before the main meal.
words.arabic_definition: طبق صغير يؤكل قبل الوجبة الرئيسية.

example.en: We ordered an appetizer before the meal.

words.definition: A sweet dish eaten after the main meal.
words.arabic_definition: طبق حلو يؤكل بعد الوجبة الرئيسية.

example.en: I had ice cream for dessert.

words.definition: A liquid that you can consume.

example.en: Would you like a drink with your meal?
